translation.en: THIS JOB IS EATING ME ALIVE.
I CAN'T BREATHE ANYMORE.
translation.ja: 俺は仕事に蝕まれてる

translation.en: I SPENT ALL THESE YEARS TRYING TO BE THE GOOD GUY,
translation.ja: 正義のために戦ってきた

translation.en: THE MAN IN THE WHITE HAT.
I'M NOT BECOMING LIKE THEM.
I AM THEM.
HEY! WHAT ARE YOU DOING, WEIRDO?
I'M DOING THE BEST SPEECH FROM DONNIE BRASCO.
OR ACTUALLY, TEN OF ME ARE DOING THE BEST SPEECH FROM DONNIE BRASCO.
translation.ja: 「フェイク」のパクリだ10人の俺が話してる

translation.en: WHAT'S UP?
GET IT TOGETHER, MAN. OKAY?
SO THE STORE WAS HIT ABOUT TWO HOURS AGO.
THEY TOOK MOSTLY TABLETS, LAPTOPS, AND CAMERAS.
translation.ja: タブレットやパソコンを盗まれたんですね？

translation.en: [music stops] SORRY.
I'D LIKE A LIST OF ALL YOUR EMPLOYEES, WHOEVER HAD ACCESS TO THE STORE.
translation.ja: 従業員のリストをいただけます？

translation.en: I'D ALSO LIKE TO APOLOGIZE FOR MY PARTNER. HIS PARENTS DIDN'T GIVE HIM ENOUGH ATTENTION.
translation.ja: それと 同僚の問題行動をおわびします

translation.en: UH, DETECTIVE...
I ALREADY SOLVED THE CASE.
WE'RE LOOKING FOR THREE WHITE MALES, ONE OF WHOM HAS SLEEVE TATS ON BOTH ARMS.
translation.ja: 犯人は白人男性の３人組だ

translation.en: AND HOW DO YOU KNOW THAT?
I HAD AN INFORMANT ON THE INSIDE.
HE'S BEEN HERE FOR YEARS. WATCHING, LEARNING. WAITING.
translation.ja: 彼は店内の様子をずっと見てきたんだ

translation.en: HIS CODE NAME?
FUZZY CUDDLE BEAR.
HE'S A NANNY CAM.
[scoffs] YOU GOT LUCKY.
NO, I GOT HERE FIVE MINUTES BEFORE YOU
AND FIGURED THAT IN THIS GIGANTIC ELECTRONICS STORE, THERE HAD TO BE AT LEAST ONE WORKING CAMERA.
translation.ja: 稼働してたカメラを探したんだ

translation.en: OH! HI, BAD GUYS!
YOU DID IT, FUZZY. YOU BUSTED 'EM.
translation.ja: モコモコ　よくやった

translation.en: IT'S TIME TO COME HOME.
[as Fuzzy] I'M NOT SURE IF I CAN.
I'VE BEEN UNDERCOVER SO LONG, I'VE FORGOTTEN WHO I AM.
translation.ja: 長い間覆面捜査をしてきて―

translation.en: I HAVE SEEN TERRIBLE THINGS. I HAVEN'T KNOWN THE TOUCH OF A WOMAN IN MANY MOONS.
translation.ja: 実社会と離れてたしずっと女性に触れてないんだ

translation.en: DETECTIVE SANTIAGO!
DON'T WALK AWAY FROM ME!
(Jake) YES, I DID CRACK THE CASE.
translation.ja: ブルックリン99分署朝礼 午前８時31分 ブルックリン99分署朝礼 午前８時31分解決したのは俺だ

translation.en: SO, SANTIAGO, WOULD YOU DO THE HONORS?
translation.ja: サンティアゴスコアを頼むよ

translation.en: (all) OHHH!
I HATE THIS!
translation.ja: 〝ペラルタ 23サンティアゴ 22〞最低 最低

translation.en: (Jake) AH, YEAH.
I HATE THIS. AND YOU'RE JUST GONNA ADD ONE. I'M WINNING.
translation.ja: １件 追加で俺の勝利が見えてきた

translation.en: IT'S A GOOD FEELING.
IT'S A GOOD FEELING. YEAH.
ENJOY IT WHILE IT LASTS.
I WILL!
JP, UPDATE ON THE MORGENTHAU MURDER?
translation.ja: モーゲンソー事件の進捗は？

translation.en: YEAH! GOOD NEWS FOR ALL YOU MURDER FANS.
translation.ja: 殺人事件好きに朗報だ

translation.en: [laughter] EARLIER THIS MORNING... SOMEONE DECIDED TO SHOOT AND KILL
translation.ja: 今朝発砲事件が起こった

translation.en: LUXURY FOOD IMPORTER HENRY MORGENTHAU. BODY WAS FOUND BY THE CLEANING LADY,
translation.ja: 被害者は食品の輸入商で清掃員の女性が発見

translation.en: DURING HER INTERVIEW, I DEDUCED, USING EXPERT DETECTIVE WORK, THAT SHE HAD SOMETHING SUPER GROSS ON HER CHIN.
translation.ja: 彼女のあごには超キモいものが付いてた

translation.en: I THINK IT WAS FLAN.
CHARLES THINKS IT WAS FLAN. I THINK IT WAS BUTTERSCOTCH PUDDING.
MAYBE IT WAS JUST OLD PERSON GUNK.
YOU KNOW HOW OLD PEOPLE ALWAYS HAVE THAT GUNK ON THEM.
OLDIE GUNK. COULD BE, YEAH.
ANYONE ELSE? HOW ABOUT WE FOCUS ON THE MURDER AND NOT THE OLD PERSON GUNK?
translation.ja: あごの付着物より事件にフォーカスしろ

translation.en: CRIME TECHS ARE AT THE SCENE NOW.
translation.ja: この後 現場に戻るわ

translation.en: WE'RE HEADING BACK WHEN THEY'RE DONE. OKAY, I WANT YOU ON THIS. IT'S GONNA BE PRIORITY ONE FOR THE NEW C.O.
translation.ja: 新任の署長も本件に興味を持つだろう

translation.en: WAIT, TELL US ABOUT THE NEW CAPTAIN.
CAPTAIN HOLT WILL BE HERE SOON. HE'LL WANNA INTRODUCE HIMSELF.
translation.ja: 本人から自己紹介がある

translation.en: DISMISSED.
HEY, GINA.
YOU KNOW ANY SCALPERS?
I WANNA ASK ROSA TO GO TO THE RIHANNA CONCERT WITH ME, BUT IT'S SOLD OUT.
translation.ja: リアーナのコンサートにローザを誘う

translation.en: OKAY, TWO POINTS TO MAKE HERE.
FIRST, RIHANNA...
YOU... AND THEN RIHANNA.
translation.ja: あなたにリアーナの曲は合わない

translation.en: YEAH. WHAT'S YOUR SECOND POINT?
SHE'S GOT A TYPE. WHICH IS REALLY ANYONE BUT YOU.
translation.ja: あなたはローザのタイプじゃない

translation.en: YEAH, THAT WAS MY EX-WIFE'S TYPE TOO.
LOOK, A RIHANNA CONCERT'S A PRETTY BIG SWING, MAN.
translation.ja: リアーナのコンサートは大げさかもね

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW. SHE'S INTO WATCHING OLD MOVIES.
translation.ja: クラシック映画なんてどう？ いいね

translation.en: COOL. WHERE WOULD I FIND A PLACE THAT SHOWS OLD MOVIES?
translation.ja: どこで上映してるか分かる？

translation.en: OH, YEAH, JUST GO ON THE INTERNET
translation.ja: インターネットでこう検索するの

translation.en: AND SEARCH FOR THE PHRASE "I WANT TO BUY TWO MOVIE TICKETS
translation.ja: インターネットでこう検索するの 〝自分に気のない女性を連れていく映画〞

translation.en: FOR A GIRL WHO DOESN'T LIKE ME."
translation.ja: 〝自分に気のない女性を連れていく映画〞

translation.en: GREAT. THANK YOU. GOOD.
HEY, YOU HEARD ANYTHING ABOUT THE NEW CAPTAIN?
translation.ja: どんな人かしら？ 興味ないね

translation.en: UH, NO, AND I DON'T CARE.
I JUST WISH CAPTAIN MCGINTLEY NEVER LEFT, HE WAS THE BEST.
translation.ja: 前の署長が最高だった

translation.en: HE WAS TERRIBLE.
YOU JUST LIKED HIM 'CAUSE HE LET YOU DO ANYTHING YOU WANTED.
translation.ja: 放任主義だからよかったんでしょ？

translation.en: ON YOUR MARKS, GET SET...
WHAT THE HELL'S GOING ON AROUND HERE?
FIRE EXTINGUISHER ROLLER CHAIR DERBY?
OKAY.
AND GO!
WHAT'S YOUR POINT?
IF I'M EVER GONNA MAKE CAPTAIN, I NEED A GOOD MENTOR. I NEED MY RABBI.
translation.ja: 師として頼れる上司がいいわ

translation.en: SORRY, DUDE... BUT THIS NEW GUY'S GONNA BE ANOTHER WASHED-UP PENCIL PUSHER WHO'S ONLY CONCERNED WITH...
translation.ja: 残念だけど新署長は厳格な堅物だ

translation.en: [robotically] FOLLOWING EVERY RULE IN THE PATROL GUIDE.
translation.ja: “すべての規則に従って職務を遂行しろ”ってな

translation.en: MEEP MORP ZEEP. ROBOT CAPTAIN ENGAGE.
translation.ja: “すべての規則に従って職務を遂行しろ”ってな “私はロボット署長だ”

translation.en: IS THAT WHAT YOU THINK? HE-HEY!
NEW CAPTAIN ALERT. [laughs]
YOU MUST BE THE NEW C.O. I'M DETECTIVE JAKE PERALTA. GREAT TO MEET YOU.
translation.ja: はじめまして　ペラルタです

translation.en: NOW DON'T LET ME INTERRUPT. YOU WERE DESCRIBING WHAT KIND OF PERSON I'M GONNA BE. I'D LIKE YOU TO FINISH.
translation.ja: 中断せずに最後までやったらどうだ？

translation.en: THAT'S NOT NECESSARY.
OR I COULD RECAP VERY QUICKLY, SURE. UM, LET'S SEE.
translation.ja: でも お望みであれば要約しますよ

translation.en: I THINK I SAID SOME JOKE ABOUT BEING A WASHED-UP PENCIL PUSHER.
translation.ja: あなたを“厳格な堅物”だと軽口をたたいて…

translation.en: NOW DO THE ROBOT VOICE. WHICH--
THE ROBOT VOICE YOU WERE DOING WHEN YOU IMPLIED I'M A RULE-FOLLOWING ROBOT.
translation.ja: “規則に従うロボット”がどうとか…

translation.en: I WANNA HEAR IT AGAIN.
MEEP MORP...ZARP.
ROBOT.
THAT'S A TERRIBLE ROBOT VOICE. YEP.
THE NEXT TIME I SEE YOU,
I'D LIKE YOU TO BE WEARING A NECKTIE.
translation.ja: ネクタイを着用しろ 前署長は服装を気にしませんでした

translation.en: OH, ACTUALLY, THE LAST CAPTAIN DIDN'T CARE IF WE WORE TIES.
translation.ja: 前署長は服装を気にしませんでした

translation.en: WELL, YOUR NEW CAPTAIN DOES.
AND MORE IMPORTANTLY, HE CARES THAT YOU FOLLOW HIS DIRECT ORDERS.
translation.ja: 部下が命令に従うかどうかもな

translation.en: EVERYONE, I'M YOUR NEW COMMANDING OFFICER, CAPTAIN RAY HOLT.
translation.ja: 私が新しい署長のレイ･ホルトだ

translation.en: SPEECH!
THAT WAS MY SPEECH.
SHORT AND SWEET.
SERGEANT JEFFORDS, A WORD.
translation.ja: ジェフォーズ　来てくれ

translation.en: YES, SIR.
[sighs] I LOVE THAT GUY.
SAME!
HE'S SO SUAVE.
DOES ANYONE GET A LITTLE BIT OF A GAY VIBE?
translation.ja: ゲイっぽい感じがしない？

translation.en: NO? OKAY.
SERGEANT, YOU WERE IN THE 1-8 WITH ME...
translation.ja: 〝レイ･ホルト署長〞 〝レイ･ホルト署長〞 久しぶりだな 久しぶりだな

translation.en: THOUGH YOU WERE SIGNIFICANTLY--
FATTER, SIR. THEY CALLED ME "TERRY TITTIES."
BECAUSE I HAD LARGE, UH--
translation.ja: 体型にちなんだ愛称があって…

translation.en: TITTIES, YES. I REMEMBER.
I NEVER LIKED THAT NICKNAME. THOUGH TO BE FAIR, IT WAS ACCURATE.
translation.ja: センスは悪いがピッタリの愛称だった

translation.en: WHAT'S THIS I HEAR ABOUT YOU BEING ON ADMINISTRATIVE LEAVE?
A YEAR AGO, MY WIFE AND I HAD TWIN BABY GIRLS.
translation.ja: １年前 双子の女の子が生まれたんです

translation.en: CAGNEY AND LACEY.
translation.ja: キャグニーとレイシーです

translation.en: THEY HAVE ADORABLE CHUBBY CHEEKS.
EVER SINCE, I KINDA GOT SCARED OF GETTING HURT. LOST MY EDGE.
translation.ja: それ以降 ケガが怖くて臆病になりました

translation.en: THERE WAS AN INCIDENT IN A DEPARTMENT STORE.
translation.ja: デパートの一件も その頃です

translation.en: HEY, MAN, YOU OKAY? YOU LOOK A LITTLE JUMPY.
translation.ja: ビクついてるけど平気か？

translation.en: I'M FINE. I'M FINE.
I THINK HE'S DEAD.
AND I'M STILL NOT RIGHT.
TELL ME ABOUT YOUR DETECTIVE SQUAD.
WELL, SCULLY, HITCHCOCK, AND DANIELS. THEY'RE PRETTY MUCH WORTHLESS, BUT THEY MAKE GOOD COFFEE.
translation.ja: あの３人は働きは悪いがうまいコーヒーを入れます

translation.en: COPY THAT.
NOW THE GOOD ONES.
ROSA DIAZ.
TOUGH, SMART, HARD TO READ, AND REALLY SCARY.
translation.ja: タフで賢いが性格は非常にキツいです

translation.en: TELL ME WHO HAS ME FOR SECRET SANTA.
NO! THAT TAKES ALL THE FUN OUT OF IT.
translation.ja: 当日の お楽しみだ

translation.en: IT'S SCULLY.
HE GOT YOU A SCARF. I'LL MAKE HIM RETURN IT.
translation.ja: スカーフを買ってたよ

translation.en: YES, YOU WILL.
CHARLES BOYLE. HE'S A GRINDER.
NOT THE MOST BRILLIANT DETECTIVE, BUT HE WORKS HARDER THAN ANYONE ELSE.
translation.ja: さほど優秀ではないが仕事熱心です

translation.en: HE'S NOT PHYSICALLY GIFTED.
translation.ja: 運動神経はイマイチですがね

translation.en: OH, MAN! MY MUFFIN.
OH, MY HEAD! MY MUFFIN, MY HEAD!
translation.ja: 頭をぶつけた 散々だ

translation.en: AND I STEPPED ON THE-- ON MY MUFFIN! AND MY HEAD AND MY MUFFIN.
translation.ja: しかもマフィンを踏んじまった

translation.en: AMY SANTIAGO.
translation.ja: エイミー･サンティアゴ 男兄弟が７人いて勝気な性格です

translation.en: SHE'S GOT SEVEN BROTHERS, SO SHE'S ALWAYS TRYING TO PROVE SHE'S TOUGH.
translation.ja: 男兄弟が７人いて勝気な性格です

translation.en: CAREFUL. THAT STUFF'S PRETTY HOT.
OH, IS IT? HMM?
SHE AND PERALTA HAVE SOME BIG BET OVER WHO GETS MORE ARRESTS THIS YEAR.
translation.ja: ペラルタと逮捕者数を競っています

translation.en: EVER SINCE THE BET, THEIR NUMBERS HAVE GONE WAY UP.
translation.ja: 賭けを始めて逮捕件数が増加しました

translation.en: TELL ME ABOUT PERALTA.
JACOB PERALTA IS MY BEST DETECTIVE.
HE LIKES PUTTING AWAY BAD GUYS AND HE LOVES SOLVING PUZZLES.
translation.ja: 正義感が強く謎解きが得意です

translation.en: THE ONLY PUZZLE HE HASN'T SOLVED IS HOW TO GROW UP.
translation.ja: 自分の内面の謎は解けていないようですがね

translation.en: THAT WAS VERY WELL PUT.
I'VE TALKED A LOT ABOUT JAKE IN MY DEPARTMENTALLY MANDATED THERAPY SESSIONS.
translation.ja: セラピーで彼の話をしたことがあるんです

translation.en: LOOK, YOU KNOW MY HISTORY. YOU KNOW HOW IMPORTANT THIS IS TO ME.
translation.ja: 昔なじみだから私を理解してるよな

translation.en: THIS PRECINCT IS DOING FINE, BUT I WANNA MAKE IT THE BEST ONE IN BROOKLYN.
translation.ja: この署を地区ナンバーワンにしたい

translation.en: AND I NEED YOUR HELP.
ABSOLUTELY, SIR.
WHERE DO WE START?
♪ WHAT IS HAPPENING? ♪
WE START WITH HIM.
OKAY, SO THE PERP CAME IN THROUGH THE WINDOW,
translation.ja: 犯人は窓から侵入して―

translation.en: LEFT THE MUDDY RED FOOTPRINT, AND APPARENTLY HAD SEX WITH THE DISH RACK.
translation.ja: 赤土の足跡を残し水切りを倒した

translation.en: SHELL CASING FOUND HERE. TWO SHOTS.
translation.ja: 発砲したのは この地点よ

translation.en: GREAT WORK, DETECTIVE.
YOU GET A TIE.
translation.ja: ご褒美だ 僕のネクタイだ

translation.en: HEY, THAT'S MINE. YOU TOOK IT FROM MY DESK.
THAT'S RIGHT, CHARLES. GOOD SOLVE. TIE FOR YOU. THANKS!
translation.ja: ご名答　これは君に

translation.en: NOW EVERYONE BE SURE TO PUT THOSE ON
BECAUSE IT'S IMPOSSIBLE TO SOLVE CRIMES UNLESS YOU'RE WEARING A TIE.
translation.ja: ネクタイしなきゃ解決は不可能だ

translation.en: LAY OFF THE CAPTAIN. THAT MAN IS GONNA BE MY RABBI.
translation.ja: 彼は私の師(ラビ)になるかも

translation.en: OKAY, FIRST OF ALL, WHEN YOU USE THE WORD "RABBI," YOU KNOW THAT TURNS ME ON
translation.ja: ラビって聞くとムラムラするから―

translation.en: AND THAT'S UNFAIR IN THE WORK ENVIRONMENT.
SECONDLY, YOUR RABBI IS A PAIN IN MY ASS.
translation.ja: それに君のラビは厄介な存在だ

translation.en: YEAH, HE'S A LITTLE TOO SERIOUS.
translation.ja: 彼はお堅いね　どう思う？

translation.en: WHAT DO YOU THINK, ROSA? HE SEEMS COOL.
translation.ja: 彼はお堅いね　どう思う？ クールよ

translation.en: YEAH, HE SEEMS COOL. I AGREE.
LOOKS LIKE THE PERP STOLE A COMPUTER, A WATCH,
translation.ja: 盗まれたのはパソコンと時計

translation.en: AND A JAMON IBERICO HAM, VALUED AT--WHAT!
translation.ja: それにハモンイベリコよ 価格は…　6000ドルですって

translation.en: $6,000 FOR A HAM?
JAMON IBERICO IS AN AMAZING CURED HAM FROM SPAIN.
translation.ja: ハモンイベリコはスペイン産の最高級ハムだ

translation.en: THEY HAD IT AT MY UNCLE'S FUNERAL. I GORGED MYSELF AT THAT FUNERAL. I MEAN, I WAS CONSTIPATED FOR THREE DAYS.
translation.ja: 叔父の葬式でむさぼり食って３日間 便秘になった

translation.en: WOW, THAT'S A GREAT STORY, CHARLES, THANK YOU.
[laughing] ALL RIGHT, LISTEN UP, EVERYBODY. BETTER CONTACT CAPTAIN HOLT, LET HIM KNOW WE GOT A TEN-TIE SITUATION.
translation.ja: 全員でネクタイを着けて署長にアピールしよう

translation.en: SPEAKING OF TIES, WHERE'S YOURS, MEEP MORP?
translation.ja: ところで 君のネクタイは？

translation.en: THIS IS FANTASTIC.
CAPTAIN! HEY!
WELCOME TO THE MURDER. WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE?
I LIKE TO KNOW WHAT MY DETECTIVES ARE UP TO. THAT OKAY BY YOU? YEP.
translation.ja: 部下の様子を見に来た

translation.en: TAKE SANTIAGO AND KNOCK ON DOORS. SEE IF THE NEIGHBORS HEARD ANYTHING.
translation.ja: 隣人の聞き込みをしろ

translation.en: DOOR DUTY? IT'S A WASTE OF TIME.
DIAZ AND BOYLE. CHECK IN THE CORONER. REPORT BACK TO ME IN AN HOUR.
translation.ja: 君たちは検視結果の確認を

translation.en: [sighs] THAT WENT WELL.
NO, IT DIDN'T.
HE'S GOT LIKE SUPER HEARING.
HEY, ROSA! ROSA. ROSA!
UM, I JUST HAPPENED TO NOTICE THAT THERE'S AN OLD MOVIE FESTIVAL PLAYING AT THE FILM FORUM THIS WEEK.
translation.ja: 今週 クラシック映画の祭典があるようなんだけど…

translation.en: WANNA GO?
SURE.
COOL! AWESOME.
THERE'S A BUNCH OF MOVIE OPTIONS.
translation.ja: いろいろ上映されるけど―

translation.en: I'LL PROBABLY JUST GO WITH SOMETHING CLASSIC
translation.ja: 例えば「市民ケーン」なんてどうかな？

translation.en: LIKE CITIZEN KANE.
translation.ja: 例えば「市民ケーン」なんてどうかな？ 趣味悪い　別のにして

translation.en: CITIZEN KANE IS TERRIBLE. PICK A GOOD MOVIE.
translation.ja: 趣味悪い　別のにして

translation.en: GOOD CALL. SMART.
I'LL DO IT.
I'LL PICK A BETTER MOVIE THAN CITIZEN KANE.
translation.ja: 「市民ケーン」より名作を探す

translation.en: (Holt) SO GINA... CIVILIAN ADMINISTRATORS LIKE YOURSELF OFTEN HAVE THEIR EAR TO THE GROUND.
translation.ja: 君のような優秀な事務員は目配りも利くはずだ

translation.en: WHAT DO SANTIAGO AND PERALTA HAVE RIDING ON THIS BET OF THEIRS?
translation.ja: 例の賭けについて教えてくれ

translation.en: I WILL TELL YOU ON SIX CONDITIONS.
NUMBER ONE, YOU LET ME USE YOUR OFFICE TO PRACTICE MY DANCE MOVES.
translation.ja: まず ここをダンスの練習に使わせること

translation.en: SECOND-- HOW ABOUT THIS? IF YOU TELL ME... MM-HMM.
I WON'T HAVE YOU SUSPENDED... WITHOUT PAY.
translation.ja: 教えれば停職処分は免れる

translation.en: OH, THAT SOUNDS GREAT.
OKAY, THE DEAL IS IF AMY GETS MORE ARRESTS, JAKE HAS TO GIVE HER HIS CAR.
translation.ja: エイミーが勝てばジェイクの車をもらえます

translation.en: IT'S AN OLD MUSTANG, AND IT'S PRETTY SWEET.
translation.ja: イケてるスポーツカーなんです

translation.en: IF HE GETS MORE ARRESTS, SHE HAS TO GO ON A DATE WITH HIM.
translation.ja: ジェイクが勝った場合のご褒美はデートです

translation.en: HE GUARANTEES IT WILL END IN SEX.
translation.ja: しかも… セックス込み

translation.en: I BET ON AT LEAST SOME OVER-THE-CLOTHES ACTION. AT THE VERY LEAST, SOME TOUCHING...
translation.ja: 少なくともお触りまでは堅いでしょう

translation.en: NO, THAT'S ENOUGH, GINA. CARESSES.
I COULD SEE HIM SHOWING UP IN A SILK ROBE.
translation.ja: ローブを着たジェイクが…

translation.en: THAT'S ENOUGH, GINA. ALL RIGHT.
THANK YOU.
(Jake) LET THE WASTING OF TIME BEGIN.
translation.ja: 被害者のマンション聞き込み 午後１時45分 被害者のマンション聞き込み 午後１時45分時間潰(つぶ)しを始めるか

translation.en: HELLO, SIR. CAN WE ASK YOU A FEW QUESTIONS?
translation.ja: こんにちは調査に協力願えます？

translation.en: DEFINITELY. YEAH.
I'M ACTUALLY--I'M SUPER GLAD YOU GUYS ARE HERE RIGHT NOW.
translation.ja: 実は…　最高のタイミングだ

translation.en: ARE YOU SMELLING THAT WEED SMELL?
(both) YEAH. 'CAUSE A DUDE BROKE IN, SMOKED WEED, AND BOLTED. [laughing] IT'S--
translation.ja: 突然 押し入ってきた男がクサを吸ったんだよ

translation.en: DO YOU THINK IT'S THE SAME DUDE THAT LEFT THAT BONG THERE ON THE FLOOR?
translation.ja: 床のパイプもその男が？

translation.en: YES.
POLICE!
HELLO. HELLO.
WHAT'S YOUR NAME?
MY NAME? MM-HMM.
MLEPNOS. CAN YOU SPELL THAT, PLEASE?
M-L-E-P...
CLAY.
DID YOU SAY "CLAY"?
YES, THE "CLAY" IS SILENT.
ALL RIGHT, GOT IT.
translation.ja: なるほどね 昨夜 この男が撃たれたの

translation.en: HAVE YOU SEEN THIS MAN BEFORE? HE WAS SHOT LAST NIGHT.
translation.ja: 昨夜 この男が撃たれたの

translation.en: OH. THANK YOU.
NO, SIR, THAT'S OURS. WE NEED THAT.
WE-- AND HE KEPT IT.
WALL STREET JOURNAL ON THE DOORMAT... TOP FLOOR APARTMENT.
translation.ja: 経済紙を読む最上階の住人

translation.en: 20 BUCKS SAYS THIS GUY'S LIKE A HOT, ELIGIBLE BACHELOR.
translation.ja: きっと魅力的な独身男ね

translation.en: I'LL TAKE THAT ACTION.
POLICE! OPEN UP!
HELLO.
[laughing] OH! HELLO, SIR! HOW ARE YOU TODAY?
translation.ja: ご機嫌はいかがですか？

translation.en: I AM DETECTIVE RIGHT-ALL-THE-TIME,
translation.ja: 俺は“キレモノの”刑事で―

translation.en: AND THIS IS MY PARTNER DETECTIVE TERRIBLE DETECTIVE.
translation.ja: こちらは“推理のさえない”刑事です

translation.en: NO SURPRISES FROM THE CORONER. A FEW GUNSHOTS, SHOULDER AND CHEST.
translation.ja: 検視では特別な所見はありません

translation.en: NONE OF THE NEIGHBORS HEARD OR SAW ANYTHING.
translation.ja: 聞き込みも収穫なしでしたが―

translation.en: AND WHAT'S WORSE, SANTIAGO STRUCK OUT WITH A 92-YEAR-OLD.
translation.ja: 聞き込みも収穫なしでしたが― 彼女は92歳の男に色目を

translation.en: THAT IS NOT ACCURATE, SIR.
WAIT, YOU HOOKED UP WITH HIM? UGH!
ALL RIGHT, HIT THE PAWN SHOPS AND CANVASS THE NEIGHBORHOOD.
AND WHILE YOU'RE OUT, YOU CAN BUY YOURSELF A TIE.
(Jake) OH, ACTUALLY, SIR...
I'M WEARING A TIE RIGHT NOW. CHECK IT OUT.
translation.ja: ネクタイを締めてるんです

translation.en: SECRET TIE.
translation.ja: 見えない所に ムダ毛の剃(そ)りすぎじゃないか？

translation.en: FIRST OF ALL, I THINK YOU'RE KIND OF OVERDOING IT
translation.ja: ムダ毛の剃(そ)りすぎじゃないか？

translation.en: WITH THE MANSCAPING. BUT MORE IMPORTANTLY, DETECTIVE, WHY DO YOU REFUSE TO TAKE MY ORDERS SERIOUSLY?
translation.ja: それよりなぜ 私の命令に従わない？

translation.en: DOES ANYONE HERE KNOW WHY IT'S SO IMPORTANT TO ME THAT YOU ALL DRESS APPROPRIATELY?
translation.ja: 私が服装にこだわる理由が分かるか？

translation.en: HMM. FOUR HIGHLY TRAINED DETECTIVES AND NOT ONE OF YOU CAN SOLVE THIS SIMPLE MYSTERY.
translation.ja: ４人の有能な刑事でも謎解きは無理か

translation.en: I WANNA BE BRIEFED ON ANY NEW DEVELOPMENTS.
translation.ja: 進展があったら報告を

translation.en: ANY QUESTIONS?
I WAS GONNA ASK YOU IF YOU THOUGHT I WAS DOING TOO MUCH MANSCAPING, BUT WE SOLVED THAT ONE.
translation.ja: ムダ毛処理の加減が確認できたので十分です

translation.en: HEY, BOYLE.
YEP. WHAT ABOUT THIS FANCY HAM STUFF?
JAMON IBERICO. YES.
THE PERP LEFT A REALLY EXPENSIVE TV BUT THEN STOLE HAM? IT DOESN'T MAKE SENSE.
translation.ja: 高価なテレビじゃなくハムを盗むのは妙だ

translation.en: IS THERE A PLACE NEARBY THE CRIME SCENE THAT SELLS IT?
BENEFICIO'S MIGHT. LET'S GO.
YOU GOTTA BRIEF THE C.O. FIRST.
WE'LL BRIEF HIM AFTER WE CATCH THE GUY.
translation.ja: 捕まえてからだ ベネフィシオ食品店午後１時45分

translation.en: MY NAME IS RATKO. I DON'T KNOW ANYTHING.
translation.ja: 俺はラトコだ　何も知らん

translation.en: YOU RECOGNIZE THIS GUY?
HENRY MORGENTHAU? NO.
translation.ja: この男に見覚えは？ ない

translation.en: MAYBE ACTUALLY LOOK AT THE PICTURE.
I DON'T KNOW HIM. I DON'T KNOW WHAT HAPPENED.
translation.ja: 俺は何も知らないんだ

translation.en: NO MORE QUESTIONS.
WELL, WHY DON'T I RUN A SCENARIO PAST YOU, RATKO, AND YOU TELL ME WHAT YOU THINK?
translation.ja: 俺のシナリオを聞いてくれ

translation.en: YOU DO KNOW MORGENTHAU. HE CAME IN HERE AND TRIED TO SELL YOU SOME HAMS.
translation.ja: 君は高価なハムの存在を知り―

translation.en: YOU KNEW THEY WERE WORTH A LOTTA MONEY, SO YOU TRIED TO STEAL THEM FROM HIM WHEN HE WASN'T HOME. ONLY HE WAS HOME, SO YOU SHOT HIM.
translation.ja: ハムを盗みに家に侵入し鉢合わせた彼を撃った

translation.en: DOES THAT SOUND FAMILIAR?
UH, MAYBE SOME ROLE PLAY WILL JOG YOUR MEMORY?
translation.ja: ロールプレイが必要かな？

translation.en: GREAT IDEA. OKAY, YEAH.
SO I'M--I'M RATKO.
NO, NO, I'M RATKO.
COME ON. I'M ALWAYS THE VICTIM.
LOOK, I'M DOING THIS WITH YOU RIGHT HERE.
FINE, FINE. [clears throat]
OH! I'M HENRY MORGENTHAU, OWNER OF DELICIOUS AND EXPENSIVE HAMS.
translation.ja: 僕は高級ハムを扱うモーゲンソーだ

translation.en: DON'T I KNOW YOU FROM THE GROCERY STORE?
KILL! AND SCENE.
(Jake) NYPD! EVERYONE DOWN!
MA'AM, IF YOU COULD JUST GET DOWN, OR...IGNORE ME AND CONTINUE SHOPPING.
translation.ja: 伏せるか無視して買い物を続けて

translation.en: BOYLE, GET THE DOOR! ON IT!
translation.ja: 出口を見張れ 了解

translation.en: RATKO!
[grunts] OH!
WHOA, WHOA, WHOA, WHOA, RATKO!
THAT'S A WASTE OF MANCHEGO!
translation.ja: チーズがもったいない

translation.en: CHARLES!
HOW ARE YOU STILL HERE? JAKE!
RATKO! HE'S NOT GOING ANYWHERE, JAKE!
[bottle clanging] RATKO!
I GOT HIM! I GOT HIM!
DON'T WORRY!
(Jake) SO NO, I DID NOT BRIEF YOU.
AND YES, HE DID GET AWAY.
translation.ja: 犯人を取り逃がしました

translation.en: BUT SOME BONUS GOOD NEWS...
translation.ja: でも 朗報があるんです

translation.en: I GOT YOU HAZELNUT.
[whispering] AND... A LITTLE SPOON THERE FOR YOU.
translation.ja: もちろんスプーン付きですよ

translation.en: [scoffs] IS HE SERIOUSLY ASSIGNING ME TO THE RECORDS ROOM?
translation.ja: 〝資料室〞 俺が資料整理係？

translation.en: I MEAN, WHY DO WE EVEN HAVE A RECORDS ROOM? COMPUTER'S BEEN INVENTED, RIGHT? I DIDN'T DREAM IT?
translation.ja: デジタル社会に資料室なんか要るか？

translation.en: YOU'RE LUCKY, MAN. I WISH I COULD GET ASSIGNED HERE FULL-TIME.
translation.ja: 俺も一日中ここにいたいよ

translation.en: YOU COULD NOT BE FARTHER FROM THE ACTION.
translation.ja: 現場から一番遠い場所だ 俺の働きを知ってるだろ？

translation.en: SERGEANT, YOU KNOW ME. I HAVE MORE ARRESTS THAN ANYONE.
translation.ja: 俺の働きを知ってるだろ？

translation.en: WILL YOU PLEASE TELL THE CAPTAIN HOW DUMB IT IS TO LOCK HIS BEST DETECTIVE IN A FILE CABINET?
translation.ja: １番の刑事を現場に戻すよう進言してくれ

translation.en: SECOND BEST. YOU'RE WRONG ABOUT HOLT.
translation.ja: ２番目よ お前は署長を知りもしないで誤解してる

translation.en: THAT MAN HAS FORGOTTEN MORE ABOUT BEING A COP THAN YOU WILL EVER KNOW.
translation.ja: お前は署長を知りもしないで誤解してる

translation.en: IN 1981, HE CAUGHT THE DISCO STRANGLER.
translation.ja: 彼はディスコ絞殺魔を捕まえたんだ

translation.en: IT'S OVER, DISCO MAN!
PUT DOWN THE YO-YO AND BACK AWAY FROM THE GIRL.
translation.ja: ヨーヨーを置いて女性から離れろ

translation.en: WOW. THE MAN IS THE REAL DEAL. YOU NEED TO LISTEN TO HIM.
translation.ja: 署長の命令に従うべきだ

translation.en: GONNA BE HARD TO WIN OUR BET WHEN YOU'RE ON THE BENCH, PERALTA.
translation.ja: 賭けの勝利が遠のくわよ

translation.en: ALTHOUGH I DID START A NEW CATEGORY.
translation.ja: 新しい項目を作ったの 〝ペラルタ １サンティアゴ ０〞

translation.en: "MURDERERS WE LET GO."
translation.ja: 〝ペラルタ １サンティアゴ ０〞 取り逃し件数よ

translation.en: AND LOOK AT THAT. YOU'RE WINNING.
translation.ja: あなたがリードしてるわ

translation.en: HAVE FUN WITH YOUR FILES.
YEAH, YOU KNOW WHAT, I WILL HAVE FUN WITH MY FILES.
translation.ja: 資料整理を楽しんでやる

translation.en: HAVE FUN WITH YOUR FACE!
SLAM!
THAT WAS A SLAM.
SO WHAT MOVIE DID YOU GET US TICKETS TO?
OH, WELL, JUST TO BE SAFE, I BOUGHT TICKETS TO ALL OF THEM.
translation.ja: 念のため全部買っておいたよ

translation.en: JUST TO BE SAFE? WHAT DOES THAT MEAN?
I DON'T KNOW, I DIDN'T WANNA MESS UP.
translation.ja: つまり… 君は頑固な面があるから決められなくて…

translation.en: BECAUSE YOU'RE SORT OF... OPINIONATED.
translation.ja: 君は頑固な面があるから決められなくて…

translation.en: YOU THINK I'M OPINIONATED? OKAY, HERE'S AN OPINION FOR YOU.
translation.ja: 私が頑固？ 人を見る目も服のセンスもないのね

translation.en: YOU'RE A BAD JUDGE OF CHARACTER AND YOUR SHIRT LOOKS LIKE VOMIT.
translation.ja: 人を見る目も服のセンスもないのね

translation.en: SO WE CAN GO SEE NORTH BY NORTHWEST.
WE'RE NOT SEEING A MOVIE TOGETHER.
GOOD CALL. SMART.
KEEP IT PROFESH.
HEY, CAPTAIN. SO YOU FOUND SOMETHING?
HEY, I LIKE THE TIE.
IF YOU CAN'T BEAT 'EM, JOIN 'EM.
ANYWAY, I THINK I GOT SOMETHING GOOD HERE.
TURNS OUT THE NAME "RATKO" IS MADE UP.
BUT I WAS DIGGING THROUGH THESE FILES-- ONE OF WHICH I LITERALLY FOUND IN A SPIDER WEB--
translation.ja: 資料を探ったらある事実に行き当たりました

translation.en: AND IT TURNS OUT THERE WERE A BUNCH OF REFERENCES TO A SERBIAN THUG, STREET NAMES "THE RAT" AND "THE BUTCHER,"
translation.ja: “ブッチャー”と呼ばれるセルビア人の殺し屋がいます

translation.en: WHO'S KNOWN TO HANG OUT AT A STORAGE UNIT
translation.ja: ボーラン･パーク付近の倉庫を拠点にしており―

translation.en: NEAR BOERUM PARK, WHICH HAS RED SOIL,
translation.ja: ボーラン･パーク付近の倉庫を拠点にしており― 現場に残された赤土の足跡とつながります

translation.en: HENCE, THE MUDDY RED FOOTPRINT ON MORGENTHAU'S COUNTER.
translation.ja: 現場に残された赤土の足跡とつながります

translation.en: THAT'S FINE WORK, DETECTIVE.
THANK YOU VERY MUCH, SIR.
TESTAMENT TO WHAT CAN BE ACHIEVED WHEN YOU DRESS APPROPRIATELY.
translation.ja: 身なりを整えたおかげですよ

translation.en: LET'S POUND IT OUT.
YOU KNOW WHAT, SUCH FINE POLICE WORK, LET'S SHARE IT WITH THE WHOLE TEAM.
translation.ja: 今のすばらしい報告を皆にも聞かせてあげてくれ

translation.en: SANTIAGO! BOYLE! DIAZ! GET IN HERE!
translation.ja: サンティアゴ　ボイル皆 集まってくれ

translation.en: BRING EVERYONE! AND A CAMERA!
translation.ja: サンティアゴ　ボイル皆 集まってくれ カメラを

translation.en: THAT'S NOT NECESSARY. OH, THEY'RE HERE!
LET'S HAVE A HAND FOR THE WORK
translation.ja: エース刑事の偉業をたたえてやってくれ

translation.en: OF THE FINE MASTER DETECTIVE, JAKE PERALTA.
translation.ja: エース刑事の偉業をたたえてやってくれ 彼に拍手を

translation.en: YEAH, LET'S HAVE A HAND, EVERYONE.
GIVE HIM A HAND. YEAH, NICE!
YEAH. THANK YOU.
(Amy) NO RECORD OF RATKO ON THE LEDGER.
translation.ja: ブルックリン貸倉庫午後10時14分 ブルックリン貸倉庫午後10時14分元帳にラトコの名はありません

translation.en: MUST'VE USED CASH.
translation.ja: ブルックリン貸倉庫午後10時14分元帳にラトコの名はありません

translation.en: WELL, I, FOR ONE, AM JUST PUMPED TO BE ON A STAKEOUT WITH YOU, CAPTAIN.
translation.ja: 署長と張り込みなんてワクワクしますよ

translation.en: YOU KNOW WHAT MY FAVORITE THING ABOUT STAKEOUTS IS?
translation.ja: 張り込みの好きな点は―

translation.en: PATROL GUIDE SAYS "NO DRESS CODE."
translation.ja: 服装規定がないことです

translation.en: SO I'M JUST THE ZIP-UP HOODIE AND MY TWO BEST FRIENDS.
translation.ja: パーカー姿で気楽に過ごせる

translation.en: DOES HE ALWAYS TALK THIS MUCH?
I JUST TUNE IT OUT. IT'S LIKE A WHITE NOISE MACHINE.
translation.ja: 雑音は遮断しましょう

translation.en: OKAY, FIRST OF ALL, THAT'S RACIST.
SECONDLY, CAPTAIN, TERRY TOLD ME YOU CAUGHT THE DISCO STRANGLER.
translation.ja: ディスコ絞殺魔を捕まえたと聞きました

translation.en: THAT'S INCREDIBLE. I'VE READ THAT CASE.
WITH ALL DUE RESPECT, SIR, WHY'D IT TAKE YOU SO LONG TO GET YOUR FIRST COMMAND?
translation.ja: なぜ昇進に時間がかかったんです？

translation.en: BECAUSE I'M GAY.
SERIOUSLY?
I'M SURPRISED YOU DIDN'T KNOW. I DON'T TRY TO HIDE IT.
translation.ja: 知らなかったとは驚きだ

translation.en: DID ANYONE ELSE GET A LITTLE BIT OF A GAY VIBE?
translation.ja: ゲイっぽい感じがしない？

translation.en: [slowed down] MANSCAPING.
DAMN!
I AM NOT A GOOD DETECTIVE.
(Rosa) HERE. I FEEL BAD THAT YOU SPENT ALL THAT MONEY ON THE MOVIE TICKETS.
translation.ja: 受け取って浪費させたから

translation.en: WHY DON'T YOU JUST GO TO THE MOVIES WITH ME?
NOPE.
OKAY.
WELL, THIS IS AWKWARD.
IT'S NOT AWKWARD.
I LIKE YOUR COMPANY. YOU'RE SWEET.
translation.ja: 一緒にいると落ち着くわ

translation.en: WHEN DID YOU COME OUT?
ABOUT 25 YEARS AGO.
THE NYPD WAS NOT READY FOR AN OPENLY GAY DETECTIVE.
translation.ja: 本部はゲイ刑事の扱いに戸惑った

translation.en: BUT THEN THE OLD GUARD DIED OUT.
translation.ja: だが 保守派勢力が弱まり―

translation.en: SUDDENLY, THEY COULDN'T WAIT TO SHOW OFF THE FACT THAT THEY HAD A HIGHLY RANKING GAY OFFICER.
translation.ja: ゲイの人材登用が活発になった

translation.en: I MADE CAPTAIN.
BUT THEY PUT ME IN A PUBLIC AFFAIRS UNIT.
I WAS A GOOD SOLDIER. I HELPED RECRUITMENT.
translation.ja: 採用活動に一役買ったが―

translation.en: BUT ALL I EVER REALLY WANTED WAS MY OWN COMMAND.
translation.ja: 本業で指揮が執りたかった

translation.en: AND NOW I FINALLY GOT IT.
translation.ja: やっと希望がかなったんだ

translation.en: AND I'M NOT GONNA SCREW IT UP.
CAPTAIN, I'M SORRY. I--
I FEEL LIKE A JACKASS.
BUT ON THE FLIP SIDE, THERE'S RATKO.
translation.ja: ついにラトコの登場だ

translation.en: HUMILITY OVER. I'M AMAZING!
FANTASTIC. 3,000 IDENTICAL BLUE DOORS.
translation.ja: 同じシャッターが並んでる

translation.en: LOOKS LIKE WE ALL GOT DOOR DUTY.
translation.ja: 聞き込みの時と同じだな

translation.en: AH, YEAH. FROM BEFORE.
translation.ja: 聞き込みの時と同じだな 扉の奥にカギが…

translation.en: GOOD ONE. YOU LOOK GREAT.
translation.ja: うまいですね きれいだね

translation.en: CLEAR.
CLEAR.
UN-BELIEVABLE!
RATKO, GREAT TO SEE YOU.
YOU CAN'T STOP ME.
I'M GOING.
ACTUALLY, YOU'RE NOT GOING ANYWHERE.
translation.ja: 残念だが…　逃げ道はない

translation.en: 'CAUSE IF YOU TAKE A LOOK TO YOUR LEFT, YOU'LL SEE DETECTIVE'S BOYLE AND DIAZ.
translation.ja: 君の左側にはボイル刑事とディアス刑事

translation.en: RIGHT THERE IS DETECTIVE SANTIAGO.
AND BEHIND YOU IS CAPTAIN HOLT.
POINT IS... MY TEAM HAS YOU SURROUNDED.
translation.ja: 君は包囲されてるんだ

translation.en: OH, MY GOD, I JUST GOT THE TIE THING!
translation.ja: ネクタイの意味が分かった

translation.en: CAPTAIN, I JUST FIGURED IT OUT.
MAYBE NOW'S NOT THE BEST TIME, DETECTIVE.
IT'S A UNIFORM!
WE'RE A TEAM, AND THE TIE IS A PART OF THAT TEAM'S UNIFORM, RIGHT?
translation.ja: 僕たちチームの制服の意味合いですね？

translation.en: YOU ASK RATKO WHAT TEAM?
NO, RATKO, SHUT UP.
IT'S IMPORTANT TO YOU BECAUSE YOU WERE KEPT OFF THE TEAM FOR SO LONG. AND NOW YOU'RE THE COACH,
translation.ja: チームの結束を図る手段として―

translation.en: AND YOU WANT US TO ALL WEAR THAT SAME UNIFORM.
translation.ja: ネクタイ着用を指導したんだ

translation.en: BOOM! NAILED IT!
YES, YOU DID. NOW JUST ARREST RATKO.
translation.ja: 分かったから逮捕しろ

translation.en: ALL RIGHT, RATKO, DOWN. DROP THE WEAPON.
translation.ja: 銃を置いて手を上げろ

translation.en: HANDS ON YOUR HEAD. HERE WE GO.
translation.ja: 銃を置いて手を上げろ そうだ

translation.en: HEY! HE'S RUNNING!
HANDS BEHIND YOUR BACK! HANDS BEHIND YOUR BACK!
(Boyle) STAY DOWN.
THAT'S HOW WE DO IT IN THE NINE-NINE, SIR.
CATCH BAD GUYS AND LOOK GOOD DOING IT.
WHAT'S WRONG WITH YOU?
NEVER TOOK OFF THE SPEEDO. BIG MISTAKE.
translation.ja: 水泳パンツが股に食い込んで…

translation.en: IT IS INSIDE ME. GREAT WORK, TEAM!
translation.ja: 水泳パンツが股に食い込んで… よくやった

translation.en: NOT A DOCTOR. SHH!
translation.ja: 日本語字幕　中尾 優子
